item.title: The Ultimate Cloud Services Cheat Sheet: AWS, GCP, Azure Compared
item.description: Your go-to reference for cloud service equivalents across AWS, GCP, and Azure. Compare 25+ services side-by-side with detailed descriptions and guidance for building agentic AI systems.

item.title: MLOps-Boilerplate: Production-Ready Machine Learning Framework
item.description: An open-source, production-ready MLOps framework that accelerates ML development from experimentation to deployment with built-in monitoring, data connectors, and CI/CD pipelines.
